confirm_deletion_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

assets_list_page.description: The provider connector is the one managing assets for which a contract negotiation can be executed. So, select the provider you want to view the assets from:
assets_list_page.no_assets: No assets found for this provider.
assets_list_page.name: Name

new_asset_page.title: New Asset
new_asset_page.select_edc: Select the EDC you want to create the asset for:
new_asset_page.name: Name
new_asset_page.create_req: To create the asset, the connector must be running. Go to the EDC list page and start it before creating the asset.

contracts_list_page.description: To ensure an exchange between provider and consumer, the provider must create a contract offer for the asset, on the basis of which a contract agreement can be negotiated. The contract definition associates policies to a selection of assets to generate the contract offers that will be put in the catalog. So, select the provider you want to view the contracts from:
contracts_list_page.not_found: No contracts found for this provider.

new_contract_page.title: New Contract
new_contract_page.edc_select: Select the EDC you want to create the asset for:
new_contract_page.access_policy: Select the policy to use as the contract's access policy:
new_contract_page.contract_policy: Select the policy to use as the contract's contract policy:
new_contract_page.select_assets: Select the assets to include in this contract:
new_contract_page.create_req: To create the contract, the connector must be running. Go to the EDC list page and start it before creating the contract.

policies_list_page.title: Policies
policies_list_page.description: The provider connector is the one managing policies for which a contract negotiation can be executed. So, select the provider you want to view the policies from:
policies_list_page.no_policies: No policies found for this provider.

new_policy_page.title: New Policy
new_policy_page.select_edc: Select the EDC you want to create the asset for:
new_policy_page.create_req: To create the policy, the connector must be running. Go to the EDC list page and start it before creating the policy.

transfers_list_page.title: Transfers
transfers_list_page.no_transfers: No transfers found for this provider.

new_transfer_page.select_provider: Select the provider you want to start the transfer:
new_transfer_page.select_consumer: Select the consumer you want to start the transfer:

negotiate_explanation.1: In order to request any data, a contract must first be negotiated between the provider and the consumer.
negotiate_explanation.2: This process results in a contract agreement.
negotiate_explanation.3: The consumer now needs to initiate the contract negotiation sequence with the provider. This sequence proceeds as follows:
negotiate_explanation.4: 1. The consumer sends a contract offer to the provider (currently, this offer must exactly match the provider’s own offer).
negotiate_explanation.5: 2. The provider validates the received offer against its own.
negotiate_explanation.6: 3. Based on the validation result, the provider either sends back a contract agreement or a rejection.
negotiate_explanation.7: 4. If validation is successful, both the provider and the consumer store the resulting agreement for future reference.

new_transfer_page.obtain_data_instruction: To obtain the data you must do the following:
new_transfer_page.tp_started_note: For the consumer pull scenario the TP will stay in STARTED state after the data has been transferred successfully.
new_transfer_page.push_flow_steps:
• The consumer will initiate a file transfer.
• The Provider Control Plane retrieves the DataAddress of the actual data source and creates a DataFlowRequest.
• The Provider Data Plane fetches data from the actual data source.
• The Provider Data Plane pushes data to the consumer service.
new_transfer_page.pre_requisit: As a pre-requisite, you need to have a logging webserver that runs on port 4000 and logs all the incoming requests. The data will be sent to this server.
new_transfer_page.click: By clicking the button below, the system will automatically initiate the data transfer using the previously negotiated contract agreement, selected asset and policy.
new_transfer_page.info: All necessary information will be included in the request, and the provider will begin sending the data to the configured destination.
new_transfer_page.pull_flow_steps:
• Provide a simple Http Proxy data plane implementation.
• Perform a file transfer initiated by the consumer.
• The provider will send an EndpointDataReference to the consumer.
• The consumer will call the endpoint and fetch the data.
new_transfer_page.see_data: You can see the data here:
new_transfer_page.create_req: To create the transfer, the connector must be running. Go to the EDC list page and start it before creating the transfer.
